<template>
    <select 
        @change="select" 
        v-model="selectedSize"
        default="4"
    >
        <option v-for="(size, key) in sizeList" :key="key"> 
            {{ size }}
        </option>
    </select>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "SelectFontSize",
    props: {
        setFontSize: Function,
        optionList: [],
    }, 
    data: function(){
        return{
            selectedSize: null,
            sizeList: [1,2,3,4,5]
        }
    },
    methods: {
        select(){
            console.log("select");
        }

    }
}
</script>


<style>
</style>
